channelId: сюда писать ID канала, из которого бот будет читать и в который будет писать
serverChatFormat: /silent-command for _, player in pairs(game.players) do player.print('[D] {author}: {message}', {{r = 0.5, g = 0.9, b = 0.9}}) end

discordCommands.!test: /silent-command print('{pref} It is working indeed, fellow **{username}**.{n}(known as **{nick}**)')
discordCommands.!players: /silent-command local names = {{}} for _, player in pairs(game.players) do if(player.connected) then names[#names + 1] = player.name end end print('{pref}Игроки онлайн: ' .. table.concat(names, ', '))
